McGowan: Hmm...You got a point there....He is shit....Well, think it over a=
nd let me know.

Brown was quite relieved that nothing happened yet. McGowa=
n then whispered to him.

McGowan: Don't be so relaxed....Any chivtron in m=
y hands is sure to die....

Periwinkle dances around like a fool. She does =
the mambo and also dances like Rikishi Phatu.

Virgo and the others laugh.
=

Virgo: Make her eat her own crap!...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fr=
om: Narrator 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, February 16, =
2002 5:11 AM
  Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


  =
Chop Shop: (GASP!) Wouldn't that make me a dung beetle? I don't know, it'd =
be pretty cool, actually.

  Barrage was hit by a shot from the base. He to=
tally ignored Apocalypse and aimed a gun at the shields. He was hit by anot=
her shot, but then fired 2 missiles at the base. Ransack holds his hand out=
 and a charge comes out of his wrist. He pressed a button as it lands in hi=
s hand, and then throws it at the base. It's set to explode when the timer =
ticks down. Venom was hit by 3 shots from the base and gasps.

  Bombshell:=
 Hee hee hee! What should I make her do? Dance!

  He sends out a signal to=
 the shell in Periwinkle's head to make her dance...

    ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: =
Saturday, February 16, 2002 3:51 AM
    Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you d=
ig it, Chivtrons?...


    OOC: Damn it! Who controls the base? Cause whoev=
er does, reply to my attacks! I'm tired of being ignored! And yet everythin=
g seems to go on very casually. Why? Cause I'm not popular like Airly? And =
Airly, it is McGowan's team! Not Barrymore! And it's Barrymore with an I...=


    IC:

    Periwinkle stops struggling and stares into space after the =
cerebro shell was inserted in her head. She was now Bombshell's slave...

 =
   McGowan swiftly dodges the autoguns shots. Virgo, Birdbot and Papertron =
are struck by the several shots but hold their ground. On the other hand, B=
arrymore, Lee and Depp dodged the shots. Barrymore with a sidejump, Lee wit=
h and duck & roll and Depp with a high jump. She remembered that although P=
ink was dead, they still had Brown.

    McGowan: I hope you Shitrons know =
that there is going to be another death over here! Your precious little Shi=
tron is about to suffer!

    Depp passes Brown to McGowan. McGowan first w=
atches Virgo fire off 8 shots, Barrymore fire off 6 shots, Lee fire off 2 f=
ireballs, Depp fire off 4 plasma shots, Birdbot fire 2 more grenades and Pa=
pertron fire off 10 shots. McGowan smiled, watching all of the shots go sai=
ling towards the Chivtron base. McGowan turns to the Insecticons.

    McGo=
wan: Hey, if someone doesn't come out soon, would you mind eating this guy?=


    Brown eyes widened and hoped that the Insecticons would do something =
less brutal...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Airshadow N=
ightlight 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, February=
 16, 2002 1:50 AM
      Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons=
?...


      OOC: Regarding Rudra's ooc's post I'll post with Aerotaur. 

 =
     Windlord/Aerotaur/Nightlight::: 

      "Stop little one!!" said Aerot=
aur while he took at Trinity and left her in Nightlight's arms. 

      "Bu=
t I wanna help, uncle Aerotaur"said Trinity. 

      "No yet"replied Aerota=
ur  who turned on the base's defences. 

      The external defences turned=
 on and fired against the Insecticons and Barrimore's team.
